title: Textile, 1970–78
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Textile, probably a sarong, with straight repeat of a white and blue-purple floral motif with branches and leaves, some of which are patterned with small, repeating dots and lines. All on a brown and bright green meander ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1970–78.
1970–78. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. Gift of John Rieck. 1978-129-5.
